name: configure
attributes: # [doc = " NFT あたりの報酬 lamports を設定する"]
body: let cfg = & mut ctx . accounts . config ;

name: withdraw
attributes: # [doc = " NFT 数に応じた lamports を引き出し、vault から recipient へ直接移動させる"]
# [doc = " CPI は一切使わず、直接 lamports 値を操作する"]
body: let vault_info = ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () ;
let recipient_info = ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () ;
let total = cfg . lamports_per_nft . checked_mul (nft_count) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: Overflow) ? ;
* * recipient_info . lamports . borrow_mut () = * * recipient_info . lamports . borrow () + total ;

fields.name: lamports_per_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 1枚あたりの lamports 報酬"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 設定アカウント（PDA 等でも可）"] # [account (init , payer = payer , space = 8 + 8)]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬支払い用 vault（lamports を保有する任意のアカウント）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: recipient
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬受取先アカウント"] # [account (mut)]
